Bread Loaf Planter: Hollow out the inside of the bread loaf and use it as a planter for small plants or flowers.
Bread Loaf Sculpture: Carve intricate designs or patterns into the bread loaf and display it as a unique piece of art.
Bread Loaf Wind Chime: Hollow out the inside of the bread loaf and attach metal rods to create a musical wind chime.
Bread Loaf Bird Feeder: Hollow out the inside of the bread loaf and fill it with birdseed, creating a simple and effective bird feeder.
Bread Loaf Pencil Holder: Hollow out the inside of the bread loaf and use it as a unique and creative pencil holder.
